courses.title: Our Courses - Start learning programming with us
courses.description: We offer a wide selection of programming courses to help you gain practical skills in the latest technologies. Register now and start your journey in IT!

course.title: Course [name] - Start learning now
course.description: Gain practical programming skills in [technologyName] with our [name] course. Register now and grow your IT career!

certificate.title: Certificate of accomplishment
certificate.subtitle: Include this credential on your LinkedIn profile, resume, or CV. Share it on social media and during your performance evaluation.

chat.title: Chat
chat.subtitle: Join our course chat to get support and exchange experiences with other participants.

prerequisites.title: Recommended Knowledge
prerequisites.none: There are no prerequisites for this course.
